attributes.action: stop giving our tax money to other countries  and to use it in our own country to help us!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should we as 'hard' tax payers allow this goverment or any goverment to freely give our tax money away to other countries to help them when our own country is in such a bad economic state. All our tax money should be invested back into our country and hopefully reduce taxes

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
